definition: temple to Confucius in his hometown Qufu

sentences.english: To deepen understanding of this street, you should know Guozijian and Confucius Temple first.
sentences.chinese: 所以，要了解这条街，就得先知道国子监和孔庙。

sentences.english: Taipei´s Confucius Temple, the first to see that Lingxing-door.
sentences.chinese: 走进台北孔庙，首先看到的就是棂星门。

sentences.english: Today hundreds of schoolchildren gathered to pay their respects.
sentences.chinese: 今天，上百名学生聚集在孔庙前表达他们的敬意。

sentences.english: Thousands of Buddhist pagodas and Confucian temples spotted the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的佛塔和孔庙散布在风景区。

sentences.english: All around the temples there were statues of dragons that have been morphed with other animals.
sentences.chinese: 在孔庙周围的是龙演变成其他动物的石像。

sentences.english: Nanjing Confucius Temple is the largest temple in China.
sentences.chinese: 南京夫子庙是中国规模最大的孔庙。

sentences.english: Then he will visit the Temple of Confucius in Qufu.
sentences.chinese: 然后他将参观曲阜的孔庙。

sentences.english: In Confucian temples both Taoist and Buddhist divinities were worshipped.
sentences.chinese: 在孔庙里，道教和佛教的神灵都可以拜。

sentences.english: I learned the South Confucious Temple only after reading Commander Tang's calling post.
sentences.chinese: 从唐司令的召集贴才得知衢州有南宗孔庙的。

sentences.english: Please take me to the Confucian Temple.
The establishment of Pan - chi also adds vitality to Confucius temple and beautifies the overall environment.
sentences.chinese: 泮池的设置，还增添了孔庙的灵气，优化了整体环境。

sentences.english: There live many kinds of egrets in the Confucian Temple in Qufu City.
sentences.chinese: 在曲阜的孔庙生活着多种鹭鸟。

sentences.english: The followings are a group of pictures taken in South Confucious Temple in Quzhou last week. Thanks for watching.
sentences.chinese: 下面上一组衢州南宗孔庙的照片，谢谢大家观看。

definition: temple to Confucius in his hometown Qufu
the Confucius family mausoleum at Qufu 曲阜, rebuilt and extended by every dynasty
temple to Kuixing, Daoist God of fate
model teacher of every age (idiom)/eternal paragon/refers to Confucius (551-479 BC) 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Yuelu Academy in Changsha, Hunan, famous ancient academy
central of the five Zhou dynasty royal academies
Imperial College (or Academy), the highest educational body in imperial China
Qufu county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong/hometown of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
